SEARCH
Package org.project.Controller.Server

Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
org.project.Controller.Server.MessageHandler
public class MessageHandler extends Object
Handles incoming messages from clients and delegates them to the appropriate server methods.

      public void handle(String jsonStr)
      Handles the incoming JSON message. depending on the ID of the message, a specific method is called which manages it
      Parameters:
      jsonStr - The JSON message string.
